title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/ego-store-lite
author: LinOnetwo
name: Ego Store Lite
description: Default game for tw-gamification, a simple store to buy bonus for yourself, and you are the store keeper.
readme:
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="https://github.com/tiddly-gittly/tw-gamification/tree/master/src/ego-store-lite">{{$:/core/images/github}} <$text text="https://github.com/tiddly-gittly/tw-gamification/tree/master/src/ego-store-lite"/></$button>

<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="https://tiddly-gittly.github.io/tw-gamification/">{{$:/core/images/home-button}} <$text text="https://tiddly-gittly.github.io/tw-gamification/"/></$button>

Default game for tw-gamification, a simple store to buy bonus for yourself, and you are the store keeper.

「游戏太微」的默认游戏，在一个简单的商店里购买对自己的奖励，而且你自己就是店主
